headline: Experienced Analytics Senior Analyst and Machine Learning Collaborator seeking new opportunities | Proficient in Python, PySpark, and SQL | Certified in AWS, Databricks and Data Science | Looking for Remote Jobs
summary:
I empower businesses with optimized data solutions and leverage cutting-edge AI to solve real-world challenges.

1. Managed a team of Python developers and gained valuable insights into team collaboration and effective communication in data migration projects.
2. Delivered optimized solutions using Python, Pandas, NumPy, and machine learning algorithms (Regression, Classification).
3. Created dynamic solutions with GenAI services (OpenAI DALL-E, Chat Completion, prompt engineering).
4. Built web applications with Flask and Streamlit for interactive data exploration.
5. Possesses hands-on experience with AWS services like Lambda, S3, Kinesis, SageMaker.
6. Proficient in SQL and MySQL for efficient database handling.
7. Familiar with MLOps and MLflow working.

Beyond the Code:

1. Volunteer Junior Machine Learning Engineer at Omdena, collaborating on projects tackling climate change and AI startup success prediction.
2. Conducted research on data analytics in Supply Chain Management.

I am passionate about using my expertise to make a positive impact. Connect with me to discuss your data challenges and explore how AI can unlock your potential.

Skills: Python, Data Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, Optimization, AWS, GenAI Services, Flask, Streamlit, SQL, MySQL, Git.

I am currently looking for new opportunities and am interested in relocating to the US, Canada, or Australia. I am open to visa sponsorship jobs. Please contact me at chandakanish7@gmail.com or via my LinkedIn profile at www.linkedin.com/in/anish-chandak.

experiences.title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.description:
1. Collaborate with 50 other AI changemakers to minimize the impact of climate change, conduct web scraping, and prepare datasets for machine learning applications.
2. Worked with the USA Pennsylvanian Local Chapter project to use machine learning to predict startup success rates and created and integrated dashboards to help investors make informed decisions.
3. Worked with the Sydney Australia Local Chapter project to extract useful information regarding disaster detection events from social media feeds.

experiences.title: Technical Intern
experiences.description:
1. Worked on improving the existing similar question search functionality of their Android app using machine learning.
2. Worked on text generation script that uses a RNN Model (LSTM) and built callable APIs for their android app using python and flask.

accomplishment_projects.title: Image Classification using AWS SageMaker
accomplishment_projects.description: Leveraged AWS SageMaker to build and deploy an image classification model. Prepared training data trained the model using SageMaker's built-in algorithms and deployed it for real-world inference.

accomplishment_projects.title: Azure Data Engineering Project
accomplishment_projects.description: It's an end-to-end data engineering project that migrates data from On-premise database (MySQL) to Cloud using Azure Services and Power BI dashboard for reporting.

volunteer_work.title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
volunteer_work.description:
I'm a community member and have worked on 3 projects with Omdena including their local chapters projects.

Projects Completed:
1. Leveraging Machine Learning to Minimize Climate Change Impacts. (https://omdena.com/projects/climate-change/)
2. Leveraging Machine Learning to predict accomplishment rate of startups. (https://omdena.com/chapter-challenges/leveraging-machine-learning-to-predict-accomplishment-rate-of-startups/)
3. Supplement Disaster Detection using social media. (https://omdena.com/chapter-challenges/supplement-disaster-detection-using-social-media/)

recommendations:
Ojasi Kesari



I got a chance to work with Anish on a GenAI POC project. He is an outstanding collaborator with formidable Python proficiency. Anish played a pivotal role in our GenAI project's integration phase, coupled with a remarkable eagerness to swiftly grasp complex concepts, highlighting his commitment and adaptability. A valuable asset to any team, and I wholeheartedly recommend him.

Rithanya Chandrasekar AshokKumar



I have had the pleasure of working closely with Anish and I am consistently impressed by his expertise as a data analyst. Anish's proficiency in Python programming and machine learning techniques is truly commendable. He has a deep understanding of complex data analysis tasks and has demonstrated the ability to solve them efficiently using Python. What sets Anish apart is his constant pursuit of learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in the field of data science. His passion for continuous improvement is truly inspiring. 

I highly recommend Anish Chandak to any team or organization seeking a dedicated and skilled data analyst with a knack for innovative problem-solving and continuous growth.
